Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.7.1, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]] or have [[Starf]] Berries growing in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost). =Details= {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.7.1, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]] or have [[Starf]] Berries growing in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost). =Details= {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.7.1, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]] or have [[Starf]] Berries growing in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost). =Details= {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
